item.title: Zball problem
item.dc:creator: @arr0w Arr0w
item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

Fixed and tidied, You had 2 begin’s and only 1 end;
[php]program ZBall;
var
x,y:integer;

procedure zball;
begin
if(findcolor(x,y,1587309,1,1,600,400))then
begin
movemouse(x,y)
clickMouse(x,y,true);
end;
end;

begin
repeat
zball;
until(false)
end.
[/php]

Read full topic

item.title: Zball problem
item.dc:creator: @jason2gs jason2gs
item.description:
@jason2gs wrote:

[code]program ZBall;
var x,y:integer;
procedure zball;
begin

if(findcolor(x,y,1587309,1,1,600,400))then
begin
  movemouse(x,y)
  clickMouse(x,y,true);
end;

begin
repeat
zball;
until(false)
end.[/code]

I can’t seem to get it to compile. Help please?

Read full topic
